title: 3 bedrooms furnished appartment
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


3 bedrooms appartment 90m² with 2 balcony in front of the Seine. 
All the room have king size or queen size bed. 
A room for Kids
All the bedroom have access to balcony. 
The kitchen is all equiped and the living room too. 
Very quiet appartement with in the island with a village mind (6 minutes to paris by train direct to Gare du nord) 
Metro line 13 and 14 are closed.
The appartement is close to a big park and will be close to the olympic village. 
A parking place is also available.
